docs.snippet: Mr. Parker was an omnipresent figure in rowing at the collegiate and national levels for decades, coaching Harvard rowers with unrivaled success and men’s and women’s Olympic medal-winning crews....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. Parker was an omnipresent figure in rowing at the collegiate and national levels for decades, coaching Harvard rowers with unrivaled success and men’s and women’s Olympic medal-winning crews.
docs.abstract: Harry Parker, an omnipresent figure in rowing at the collegiate and national levels for decades, coaching Harvard rowers with unrivaled success and men's and women's Olympic medal-winning crews, dies at age 77.

headline.main: Harry Parker Dies at 77; Guiding Hand in Rowing
headline.print_headline: Harry Parker Dies at 77; Guiding Hand in Rowing
